channel.title: Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Neuro drives national retail wins with ChatGPT Business
item.description: Neuro uses ChatGPT Business to scale nationwide with fewer than seventy employees. From drafting contracts to uncovering insights in customer data, the team saves time, cuts costs, and turns ideas into growth. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/neurogum

item.title: Fighting the New York Times’ invasion of user privacy
item.description: OpenAI is fighting the New York Times’ demand for 20 million private ChatGPT conversations and accelerating new security and privacy protections to protect your data. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/fighting-nyt-user-privacy-invasion

item.title: GPT-5.1 Instant and GPT-5.1 Thinking System Card Addendum
item.description: This GPT-5 system card addendum provides updated safety metrics for GPT-5.1 Instant and Thinking, including new evaluations for mental health and emotional reliance. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/gpt-5-system-card-addendum-gpt-5-1

item.title: GPT-5.1: A smarter, more conversational ChatGPT
item.description: We’re upgrading the GPT-5 series with warmer, more capable models and new ways to customize ChatGPT’s tone and style. GPT-5.1 starts rolling out today to paid users. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/gpt-5-1

item.title: Free ChatGPT for transitioning U.S. servicemembers and veterans
item.description: OpenAI is offering U.S. servicemembers and veterans within 12 months of retirement or separation a free year of ChatGPT Plus to support their transition to civilian life. The tools can help with resumes, interviews, education, and planning for what’s next. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/chatgpt-for-veterans

item.title: Understanding prompt injections: a frontier security challenge
item.description: Prompt injections are a frontier security challenge for AI systems. Learn how these attacks work and how OpenAI is advancing research, training models, and building safeguards for users. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/prompt-injections

item.title: Notion’s rebuild for agentic AI: How GPT‑5 helped unlock autonomous workflows
item.description: Discover how Notion rebuilt its AI architecture with GPT-5 to create autonomous agents that reason, act, and adapt across workflows. Learn how this shift unlocked smarter, faster, and more flexible productivity in Notion 3.0. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/notion

item.title: From Pilot to Practice: How BBVA Is Scaling AI Across the Organization
item.description: BBVA is reimagining how employees work with ChatGPT Enterprise, embedding AI into everyday operations. The bank has saved hours per week per employee, created 20,000+ Custom GPTs, and achieved up to 80% efficiency gains. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/bbva-2025

item.title: AI progress and recommendations
item.description: AI is advancing fast. We have the chance to shape its progress—toward discovery, safety, and a better future for everyone. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/ai-progress-and-recommendations

item.title: Introducing the Teen Safety Blueprint
item.description: Discover OpenAI’s Teen Safety Blueprint—a roadmap for building AI responsibly with safeguards, age-appropriate design, and collaboration to protect and empower young people online. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/introducing-the-teen-safety-blueprint

item.title: 1 million business customers putting AI to work
item.description: More than 1 million business customers around the world now use OpenAI. Across healthcare, life sciences, financial services, and more, ChatGPT and our APIs are driving a new era of intelligent, AI-powered work. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/1-million-businesses-putting-ai-to-work
